findings.title: Use of Upgradable Contract Design
findings.description: The `LatteVault` smart contract is upgradable, allowing the owner to modify the contract logic at any time, making it untrustworthy.

findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: The controlling authorities can change the state variables without letting the users aware of the changes that may affect their funds.

findings.title: Insufficient Logging for Privileged Functions
findings.description: Privileged functions are not logged properly by emitting events, making it difficult for users to monitor their execution.
